name: fuzzy-search
label: Fuzzy Search
description: Connector provides actions to search fuzzy word in string.

operations.title: Filter JSON by Key Value
operations.description: Filters JSON as per provided key value pair.

parameters.title: Record JSON
parameters.name: recordJSON
parameters.description: Specify list of JSON or JSON to filter data.
parameters.tooltip: Specify list of JSON or JSON to filter data.

parameters.title: Target Key
parameters.name: targetKey
parameters.description: Specify target key for data filtering.
parameters.tooltip: Specify target key for data filtering.

parameters.title: Target Key's Value
parameters.name: targetKeyValue
parameters.description: Specify target key's value for data filtering.
parameters.tooltip: Specify target key's value for data filtering.

parameters.title: Similarity Threshold
parameters.name: similarityThreshold
parameters.description: Specify threshold to match key value data in JSON.
parameters.tooltip: Specify threshold to match key value data in JSON.
